thread.title: Claudio Ranieri sacked: Leicester axe Premier League winner as Twitter reacts to the shock news
thread.title_full: Claudio Ranieri sacked: Leicester axe Premier League winner as Twitter reacts to the shock news

author: achapman
title: Claudio Ranieri sacked: Leicester axe Premier League winner as Twitter reacts to the shock news
text:
'Keep Smiling' Claudio Ranieri sacked: Leicester axe Premier League winner as Twitter reacts to the shock news 
Foxes confirm Italian has been given the chop despite leading them to historic title win last season By ANTHONY CHAPMAN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JOSE MOURINHO has led the lines of footballers, pundits and even celebrities paying tribute to sacked Leicester boss Claudio Ranieri. 
The Foxes manager led his side to a historic Premier League trophy last season against all the odds. Reuters 1 Claudio Ranieri has reportedly been sacked by Leicester 
But Ranieri will no longer be in charge at the King Power Stadium after yesterday‚Äôs 2-1 Champions League last-16 first-leg defeat to Sevilla. Keep up to date with ALL the Leicester news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Leicester have been widely credited with showing some much-needed fight in Europe after struggling in the league. 
But it appears the club‚Äôs owners are more concerned with the impending relegation battle rather than the chance of making further progress abroad. A post shared by Jose Mourinho (@josemourinho) on Feb 23, 2017 at 3:18pm PST A post shared by Gary Lineker (@garylineker) on Feb 23, 2017 at 12:39pm PST Ranieri sacked WTF 
‚Äî Philip Neville (@fizzer18) February 23, 2017 Ranieri sacking is a joke. Players have completely let him down and believed their on hype.! 
‚Äî Aaron McCarey (@mccareyA1) February 23, 2017 Tony Cottee speaks on the shock of Leicester City sacking manager Claudio Ranieri The dreaded price of over achieving. Football at its craziest if true !!! 
‚Äî Danny Higginbotham (@Higginbotham05) February 23, 2017 Wayne Shaw sacked for eating a pie.Claudio Ranieri sacked for winning the Premier League.This is the week football ate itself. 
‚Äî Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) February 23, 2017 Claudio Ranieri sacked! Unfortunate news I think! Wonder how I'd feel if I was a Leicester player right nowü§î. Could I have done more ü§îüò™ 
‚Äî Ian Wright (@IanWright0) February 23, 2017 
And Mourinho paid a heartfelt tribute on Instagram, writing: "CHAMPION OF ENGLAND and FIFA MANAGER of THE YEAR sacked. That‚Äôs the new football Claudio. Keep smiling AMICO. Nobody can delete the history you wrote.‚Äù 
Lovers of the beautiful game were not impressed with Leicester's harsh decision, with Phil Neville exclaiming: ‚ÄúRanieri sacked WTF.‚Äù 
Aaron McCarey said: ‚ÄúRanieri sacking is a joke. Playing have completely let him down and believed their own hype!‚Äù 
Danny Higginbotham noted: ‚ÄúThe dreaded price of over-achieving. Football at its craziest!‚Äù 
Piers Morgan joined in the fun, writing: ‚ÄúWayne Shaw sacked for eating a pie. Claudio Ranieri sacked for winning the Premier League. This is the week football ate itself.‚Äù
